name: Lester
description: Lester ($LESTER) is the latest ERC-20 meme token created by the crypto community and inspired by Dogecoin’s Twitter excitement. Designed purely as a fun and community-driven project, $LESTER has zero tax, no developers, and no formal team—its success relies entirely on the dedication and enthusiasm of its supporters. Built as a true community token, $LESTER allows holders to come together in a decentralized, no-strings-attached environment, free from fees or developer interventions. With its unique approach of being “by the people, for the people,” $LESTER taps into the spirit of early meme tokens, providing a space for crypto enthusiasts to celebrate, trade, and unite around a common, lighthearted cause. Whether you're here for laughs or looking to join a growing movement, $LESTER invites everyone to be a part of this new token sensation.
